name: Bun and Gun
description:
Play as a burger bun that must complete the orders by collecting ingredients on the order ticket. Don't let anything get in your way. If they do... BUN. AND. GUN.

Using WASD to move around and jump onto platforms. To shoot your (ketchup) gun, press SPACE to gun them down and temporarily stun them.

Credits: Art: Max Pietsch (Sprites) and Sakina Mehdi

Programming: John Mai and Scott Krabbenhoft

SpringySpringo: Bossa Shop Theme, HD (used for the main menu)

SubspaceAudio: Stage 2 (used for the arena level)

KarateStudios: Bossa Town (used for the game over screen)

Chiptone: SFX
